main event: Several witnesses observed an unidentified object moving at a high rate of speed in Oakton, Virginia on April 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was first observed at approximately 6:15 PM and was described as round or disc-shaped., Witnesses noted the object increased in size as it approached and decreased as it moved away., No lights or distinguishing features were observed on the object., The investigation found no known air traffic in the area at the time of the sighting., A limited investigation suggested that an aircraft operating nearby might have caused the sighting confusion.
